ing: 1 (6 ounce) can frozen orange juice concentrate
3 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles cherry-flavored lemon-lime soda (such as Cherry 7UPÂ®)
des: "A frozen drink that is perfect on hot summer nights."
ins: Mix pineapple juice, vodka, sugar, orange juice concentrate, water, and amaretto liqueur in a large container; freeze overnight. To serve, fill a large glass about half full of the slushy mixture and fill the rest of the glass with cherry-flavored lemon-lime soda.
